dlentry.dd: This method is deprecated as of v3.3.0. This method is deprecated as of v3.3.0.

note.p: @note If you need to resume subscribing to the video streams of remote users in the channel after calling \ref IRtcEngine::setDefaultMuteAllRemoteVideoStreams "setDefaultMuteAllRemoteVideoStreams" (true), do the following: @note If you need to resume subscribing to the video streams of remote users in the channel after calling \ref IRtcEngine::setDefaultMuteAllRemoteVideoStreams "setDefaultMuteAllRemoteVideoStreams" (true), do the following:

ul.li: If you need to resume subscribing to a single user's video stream, call () and specify the ID of the remote user you want to subscribe to. If you need to resume subscribing to a single user's video stream, call () and specify the ID of the remote user you want to subscribe to.

If you want to resume subscribing to multiple users' video streams, you need to call () multiple times. If you want to resume subscribing to multiple users' video streams, you need to call () multiple times.
